TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants leadership bonuses to minions within %d1 tiles
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Octroie des bonus de commandement à ses troupes jusqu'à %d1 [NUM1:case:cases] de lui
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Weist Führungsboni auf Untergebene innerhalb von %d1 Feldern zu
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants leadership bonuses to minions within %d1 tiles
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants leadership bonuses to minions within %d1 tiles

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires free command space available on the tile
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requiert un commandant disponible (au moins un emplacement libre) sur la case
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires free command space available on the tile
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires free command space available on the tile

TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Troupes commandées (%d1/%d2) l'influençant à une distance de %d4 : %s3[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Grants 1 Scorched Staff item in the city
TEXT.French: Fournit 1 Bâton Calciné à la ville
TEXT.German: Erschafft einen Gegenstand "Versengter Stab" in der Stadt
TEXT.Italian: Grants 1 Scorched Staff item in the city
TEXT.Spanish: Grants 1 Scorched Staff item in the city

TEXT.English: After completion of %s3_BuiltItem in %s4_CityName, %d1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] was converted to %d2 [ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: La production de %s3_BuiltItem à %s4_CityName a conduit à un excédent de %d1 [ICON_PRODUCTION], converti en %d2 [ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.German: Nach der Fertigstellung von %s3_BuiltItem in %s4_CityName, wurden %d1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] in %d2 [ICON_GOLD] umgewandelt
TEXT.Italian: After completion of %s3_BuiltItem in %s4_CityName, %d1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] was converted to %d2 [ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Spanish: After completion of %s3_BuiltItem in %s4_CityName, %d1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] was converted to %d2 [ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: %s1_OldUnitName has reached the peak of his Awakened Power and is now a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.French: %s1_OldUnitName has reached the peak of his Awakened Power and is now a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.German: %s1_OldUnitName hat den Gipfel seiner Macht erreicht und wird nun %s2_NewUnitName genannt.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_OldUnitName has reached the peak of his Awakened Power and is now a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_OldUnitName has reached the peak of his Awakened Power and is now a %s2_NewUnitName

TEXT.English: %s1_OldUnitName has come to terms with his curse and is now able to control himself better as a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.French: %s1_OldUnitName has come to terms with his curse and is now able to control himself better as a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.German: %s1_OldUnitName hat sich mit dem Fluch auseinandergesetzt und kann sich ab sofort besser kontrollieren unter dem Namen %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.Italian: %s1_OldUnitName has come to terms with his curse and is now able to control himself better as a %s2_NewUnitName
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_OldUnitName has come to terms with his curse and is now able to control himself better as a %s2_NewUnitName

TEXT.English: %s1_UnitName gets a taste of blood and loses control of himself
TEXT.French: %s1_UnitName gets a taste of blood and loses control of himself
TEXT.German: %s1_UnitName hat Blut geleckt und verliert die Kontrolle über sich.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_UnitName gets a taste of blood and loses control of himself
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_UnitName gets a taste of blood and loses control of himself

TEXT.English: %s1_OldUnitName been dominated into servitude as a %s2_NewUnitName. The curse is a heavy burden and it may take time for his mind to recover
TEXT.French: %s1_OldUnitName been dominated into servitude as a %s2_NewUnitName. The curse is a heavy burden and it may take time for his mind to recover
TEXT.German: %s1_OldUnitName wurde als %s2_NewUnitName unter Kontrollen gebracht. Der Fluch scheint eine schwere Bürde zu sein und es kann einige Zeit brauchen, bis er sich wieder erholt.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_OldUnitName been dominated into servitude as a %s2_NewUnitName. The curse is a heavy burden and it may take time for his mind to recover
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_OldUnitName been dominated into servitude as a %s2_NewUnitName. The curse is a heavy burden and it may take time for his mind to recover

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName was fired at by a %s4_CivAdj %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_UnitName [NUM1:a été attaqué:a été attaquée:ont été attaqués:ont été attaquées] par [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_EnUName ! (%d3_Damage%% de dégâts)
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName wurde von einer feindlichen Einheit %s2_EnUName angegriffen!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità di %s1_UnitName è stata attaccata dall'unità nemica di %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM2:Un:Una:Unos:Unas] %s2_EnUName del enemigo [NUM2:ha:ha:han:han] atacado a [NUM1:vuestro:vuestra:vuestros:vuestras] %s1_UnitName (%d3_Damage%% de daño)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has fired upon a %s4_CivAdj %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat eine feindliche Einheit %s2_EnUName angegriffen!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità di %s1_UnitName ha attaccato un'unità nemica di %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: [NUM1:Vuestro:Vuestra:Vuestros:Vuestras] %s1_UnitName [NUM1:ha:ha:han:han] atacado a [NUM2:un:una:unos:unas] %s2_EnUName del enemigo. (%d3_Damage%% de daño)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has died trying to attack a %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat eine Einheit %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName angegriffen und ist ... leider umgekommen!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità di %s1_UnitName è [NUM1:morto:morta] attaccando %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat eine Einheit %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName vernichtet!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità %s1_UnitName ha distrutto l'unità nemica %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has withdrawn from combat with a %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_UnitName a battu en retraite face à [NUM2:un:une:des:des] %s2_EnUName %s3_CivAdj !
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit %s1_UnitName hat im Kampf gegen eine Einheit %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName den Rückzug angetreten!
TEXT.Italian: La tua unità %s1_UnitName si è ritirata dal combattimento contro l'unità nemica %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_EnUName has withdrawn from combat with your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.French: L'unité de combat ennemie (%s1_EnUName) a fui le combat face à votre %s2_UnitName !
TEXT.German: Eine Einheit %s1_EnUName hat im Kampf gegen Eure Einheit %s2_UnitName den Rückzug angetreten!
TEXT.Italian: L'unità nemica %s1_EnUName si è ritirata dal combattimento contro l'unità nemica %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.English: A %s3_CivAdj %s1_EnUName has fled from combat with your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.French: Un %s1_EnUName %s3_CivAdj a fui le combat contre votre %s2_UnitName !
TEXT.German: Ein %s3_CivAdj %s1_EnUName ist aus dem Gefecht mit Eurer %s2_UnitName geflohen!
TEXT.Italian: A %s3_CivAdj %s1_EnUName has fled from combat with your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Spanish: A %s3_CivAdj %s1_EnUName has fled from combat with your %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has fled from combat with a %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Votre %s1_UnitName a fui le combat contre un %s2_EnUName %s3_CivAdj !
TEXT.German: Eure %s1_UnitName ist aus dem Kampf mit einer %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName geflohen!
TEXT.Italian: Your %s1_UnitName has fled from combat with a %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_UnitName has fled from combat with a %s3_CivAdj %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: [SPACE]not on any units sharing the tile
TEXT.French: [SPACE]not on any units sharing the tile
TEXT.Italian: [SPACE]not on any units sharing the tile
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]not on any units sharing the tile

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Randomly grants the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion (%d3% chance each turn)
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Donne aléatoirement la promotion [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] (%d3% de chance par tour)
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verleiht zufällig die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] Beförderung (%d3% Chance pro Runde)
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Randomly grants the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion (%d3% chance each turn)
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Randomly grants the [LINK=%s1]%s2_promotion[\LINK] promotion (%d3% chance each turn)

TEXT.French: Requiert que l'équipe possède moins de[SPACE]
Requiert que l'équipe possède au moins[SPACE]

TEXT.English: Writes all Random numbers to RandomLogger.log in My Documents\My Games\Beyond the Sword\Logs directory to assist with OOS debugging
TEXT.French: Writes all Random numbers to RandomLogger.log in My Documents\My Games\Beyond the Sword\Logs directory to assist with OOS debugging
TEXT.German: Writes all Random numbers to RandomLogger.log in My Documents\My Games\Beyond the Sword\Logs directory to assist with OOS debugging
TEXT.Italian: Writes all Random numbers to RandomLogger.log in My Documents\My Games\Beyond the Sword\Logs directory to assist with OOS debugging
TEXT.Spanish: Writes all Random numbers to RandomLogger.log in My Documents\My Games\Beyond the Sword\Logs directory to assist with OOS debugging

TEXT.English: Allows any player to utilize the keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+Z and CTRL+SHIFT+X to enable AI Autoplay (X for single turn, Z for a popup to allow multiple turns).[NEWLINE]Autoplay function will affect all players.
TEXT.French: Allows any player to utilize the keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+Z and CTRL+SHIFT+X to enable AI Autoplay (X for single turn, Z for a popup to allow multiple turns).[NEWLINE]Autoplay function will affect all players.
TEXT.German: Erlaubt es den Spielern, mit Hilfe der Keyboard-Shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+Z und CTRL+SHIFT+X AI Autoplay zu aktivieren (X für eine einzelne Runde, Z für ein Popup-Fenster, wo die Anzahl der Runden eingestellt werden kann.[NEWLINE]Die Autoplay-Funktion hat Auswirkungen auf alle Spieler gleichermaßen.
TEXT.Italian: Allows any player to utilize the keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+Z and CTRL+SHIFT+X to enable AI Autoplay (X for single turn, Z for a popup to allow multiple turns).[NEWLINE]Autoplay function will affect all players.
TEXT.Spanish: Allows any player to utilize the keyboard shortcuts CTRL+SHIFT+Z and CTRL+SHIFT+X to enable AI Autoplay (X for single turn, Z for a popup to allow multiple turns).[NEWLINE]Autoplay function will affect all players.

TEXT.English: Random Check made: %d1 out of %d2 for %s3
TEXT.French: Random Check made: %d1 out of %d2 for %s3
TEXT.German: Random Check made: %d1 out of %d2 for %s3
TEXT.Italian: Random Check made: %d1 out of %d2 for %s3
TEXT.Spanish: Random Check made: %d1 out of %d2 for %s3

TEXT.German: %s1 hat sich bei Eurer Einheit %s2 vermindert zu %s3
Eure Einheit %s2 hat nach dem Verlust von %s1 %d3% Schaden genommen

TEXT.English: The village appears to have been abandoned
TEXT.French: The village appears to have been abandoned
TEXT.Italian: The village appears to have been abandoned
TEXT.Spanish: The village appears to have been abandoned

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the unit is specifically allowed to gain the promotion
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the unit is specifically allowed to gain the promotion
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erfordert für die Einheit eine ausdrückliche Erlaubnis zum Erhalt der Beförderung
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the unit is specifically allowed to gain the promotion
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires that the unit is specifically allowed to gain the promotion

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Deals %d1% damage to the unit when Promotion is removed
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Deals %d1% damage to the unit when Promotion is removed
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verursacht bei der Einheit %d1% Schaden, wenn Beförderung entfernt wird
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Deals %d1% damage to the unit when Promotion is removed
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Deals %d1% damage to the unit when Promotion is removed

TEXT.English: %s1 has questioned his loyalty to our Empire
TEXT.French: %s1 has questioned his loyalty to our Empire
TEXT.German: %s1 stellt Loyalität zu Eurem Reich in frage.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has questioned his loyalty to our Empire
TEXT.Spanish: s1 has questioned his loyalty to our Empire

TEXT.English: %s1 has taken his own life rather than turn upon our Empire
TEXT.French: %s1 has taken his own life rather than turn upon our Empire
TEXT.German: Die Einheit %s1 hat sich lieber umgebracht, als sich gegen Euer Reich zu wenden.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has taken his own life rather than turn upon our Empire
TEXT.Spanish: s1 has taken his own life rather than turn upon our Empire
[ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %s1_Change puntos de experiencia

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%s1_XP EXP dans les villes ayant pour religion : %F2_RelIcon
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%s1_XP Erfahrungspunkte in Städten mit der Religion %F2_RelIcon

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%s1_XP puntos de experiencia en las ciudades con %F2_RelIcon

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%s1_XP EXP dans les villes ayant une [ICON_RELIGION] d'état

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%s1_XP [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia] en las ciudades con [ICON_RELIGION] oficial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité gagne %s1 EXP par tour jusqu'à ce qu'elle atteigne %s2 EXP.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Diese Einheit erhält jede Runde %s1 Erfahrungspunkt(e) bis sie %s2 EP erreicht hat.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Ritual can be resisted with a base chance of %d1% to hit, modified by Potency and Shielding to be anywhere between %d2% and %d3%.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Ritual can be resisted with a base chance of %d1% to hit, modified by Potency and Shielding to be anywhere between %d2% and %d3%.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Dem Ritual kann mit einer Basischance von %d1% widerstanden werden, modifiziert durch Magiebegabung und Schild irgendwo zwischen %d2% und %d3%.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ritual can be resisted with a base chance of %d1% to hit, modified by Potency and Shielding to be anywhere between %d2% and %d3%.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Ritual can be resisted with a base chance of %d1% to hit, modified by Potency and Shielding to be anywhere between %d2% and %d3%.

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhöht den Wert des natürlichen Erfahrungszugewinns um %s1
Verändert die Produktion um %s1[ICON_PRODUCTION] für Rituale

TEXT.English: Inserts %s1 culture for the unit's Civilization
TEXT.French: Inserts %s1 culture for the unit's Civilization

TEXT.Italian: Inserts %s1 culture for the unit's Civilization
TEXT.Spanish: Inserts %s1 culture for the unit's Civilization

TEXT.German: Erhöht die Trainingsgeschwindigkeit für Einheiten mit demselben Angriffstypus um %s1
TEXT.Italian: Enhances Training Rate for units of the same unit combat by %s1
TEXT.Spanish: Enhances Training Rate for units of the same unit combat by %s1

TEXT.Italian: Enhances Training Rate for units of %s1 by %s2
TEXT.Spanish: Enhances Training Rate for units of %s1 by %s2

TEXT.Spanish: Enhances Training Limit for units of the same unit combat by %s1

TEXT.Spanish: Enhances Training Limit for units of %s1 by %s2

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Abschirmung falls Ressource verfügbar: %s1 im gesamten Reich

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%d2% chance to expire each turn after %d1 turns.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%d2% de chance d'expirer à chaque tour après %d1 [NUM1:tour:tours].
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%d2% Chance, jede Runde nach %d1 Runden zu verschwinden
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%d2% chance to expire each turn after %d1 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%d2% chance to expire each turn after %d1 turns.

TEXT.English: Cannot be built by any Civilization
TEXT.French: Ne peut être construit par aucune civilisation
TEXT.German: Kann von keiner Zvilisation gebaut werden
TEXT.Italian: Cannot be built by any Civilization
TEXT.Spanish: Cannot be built by any Civilization

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Forbids the unit from participation in combat
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Forbids the unit from participation in combat
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verhindert die Beteiligung der Einheit an Kämpfen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Forbids the unit from participation in combat
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Forbids the unit from participation in combat

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all players control of the unit
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all players control of the unit
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gibt ALLEN Spielern Kontrolle über diese Einheit
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all players control of the unit
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all players control of the unit

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unit Costs no Supply when outside borders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité ne nécessite pas d'entretien hors de nos frontières.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Einheit verursacht außerhalb der Grenzen keinen Unterhalt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Unit Costs no Supply when outside borders
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Unit Costs no Supply when outside borders

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Bronze Weapons
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité doit être capable d'équiper des armes de bronze
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erfordert die Befähigung zur Benutzung von Bronzewaffen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Bronze Weapons
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Bronze Weapons

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Iron Weapons
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]L'unité doit être capable d'équiper des armes d'acier
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Iron Weapons
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Iron Weapons

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Mithril Weapons

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Mithril Weapons
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Requires unit is allowed to use Mithril Weapons

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Causes all progress on Rituals to be lost for your team and anybody at war with you.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Causes all progress on Rituals to be lost for your team and anybody at war with you.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Zerstört den bisherigen Fortschritt aller Rituale für Euch und Euer Team, sowie jeden, der sich mit Euch im Krieg befindet.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Causes all progress on Rituals to be lost for your team and anybody at war with you.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Causes all progress on Rituals to be lost for your team and anybody at war with you.

TEXT.English: [SPACE](World Project: %d1_Num Left - Next Refresh in %d2 Turns)
TEXT.French: [SPACE](Projet mondial : reste %d1_Num - Prochaine mise à jour dans %d2 [NUM2:tour:tours])

TEXT.English: [SPACE](Team Project: %d1_Num Left - Next Refresh in %d2 Turns)
TEXT.French: [SPACE](Projet d'équipe : reste %d1_Num - Prochaine mise à jour dans %d2 [NUM2:tour:tours])
TEXT.Italian: [SPACE](Progetto di squadra: %d1_Num [NUM1:rimanente:rimanenti] - Next Refresh in %d2 Turns)
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE](Proyecto de equipo: %d1_Num [NUM1:restante:restantes] - Next Refresh in %d2 Turns)

TEXT.English: Forsake the teachings and guidance of Esus to walk the streets in full visibility
TEXT.French: Forsake the teachings and guidance of Esus to walk the streets in full visibility
TEXT.German: Verlasst die Lehre und die Führung von Esus, um in voller Sichtbarkeit durch die Straßen zu wandeln
TEXT.Italian: Forsake the teachings and guidance of Esus to walk the streets in full visibility
TEXT.Spanish: Forsake the teachings and guidance of Esus to walk the streets in full visibility

TEXT.English: Renounce misguided ways to return to the embrace of Esus and shun the world
TEXT.French: Renounce misguided ways to return to the embrace of Esus and shun the world
TEXT.German: Entsagt den Irrwegen, um zur Umarmung von Esus zurückzukehren und die Welt zu meiden
TEXT.Italian: Renounce misguided ways to return to the embrace of Esus and shun the world
TEXT.Spanish: Renounce misguided ways to return to the embrace of Esus and shun the world

TEXT.English: %s1 has begun performing the Ritual of %s2
TEXT.French: %s1 has begun performing the Ritual of %s2
TEXT.German: %s1 hat begonnen, das Ritual von %s2 durchzuführen
TEXT.Italian: %s1 has begun performing the Ritual of %s2
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 has begun performing the Ritual of %s2

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Augmente la portée de téléportation de %d1 cases

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Enhances damage limit for ranged combat by %D1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Enhances damage limit for ranged combat by %D1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Enhances damage limit for ranged combat by %D1

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Blocks access to Bonuses for all of your current enemies until they complete %d1 Rituals to restore themselves
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Blocks access to Bonuses for all of your current enemies until they complete %d1 Rituals to restore themselves
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Verhindert den Zugang zu Boni für all Eure momentanen Feinde solange, bis sie %d1 Rituale für eine Wiedererlangung vollendet haben
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Blocks access to Bonuses for all of your current enemies until they complete %d1 Rituals to restore themselves
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Blocks access to Bonuses for all of your current enemies until they complete %d1 Rituals to restore themselves

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Brings you %d1 Ritual closer to Restoration of your access to Bonuses
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Brings you %d1 Ritual closer to Restoration of your access to Bonuses
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Bringt Euer %d1 Ritual näher an die Wiedererlangung Eurer Boni
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Brings you %d1 Ritual closer to Restoration of your access to Bonuses
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Brings you %d1 Ritual closer to Restoration of your access to Bonuses

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires your Bonuses have been Blocked by an opponent's Ritual
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires your Bonuses have been Blocked by an opponent's Ritual

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all your Team's Units Invisibility while inside Team Culture Range but not in a City for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all your Team's Units Invisibility while inside Team Culture Range but not in a City for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Macht alle Einheiten Eures Teams für weitere %D1 Runden unsichtbar, solange sie sich innerhalb Eurer kulturellen Grenzen, aber nicht in einer Stadt befinden.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all your Team's Units Invisibility while inside Team Culture Range but not in a City for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Grants all your Team's Units Invisibility while inside Team Culture Range but not in a City for an additional %D1 turns.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all Invisible Units within Team Culture Range to your Team for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all Invisible Units within Team Culture Range to your Team for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Deckt alle unsichtbaren Einheiten innerhalb der kulturellen Grenzen Eures Teams für weitere %D1 Runden auf.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all Invisible Units within Team Culture Range to your Team for an additional %D1 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Reveals all Invisible Units within Team Culture Range to your Team for an additional %D1 turns.

TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1][ICON_BULLET]Religions will never passively spread in your cities

TEXT.English: Our forces have plundered %d1 %F2_Commerce from a %s3_Adj %s4_Unit.

TEXT.English: The animals of Erebus have become far more hostile in the abnormal, lengthy Winter brought on by Mulcarn's Reign. But worse than that, they seem to have bonded together and focused on the Civilized races as their favorite prey.
TEXT.French: The animals of Erebus have become far more hostile in the abnormal, lengthy Winter brought on by Mulcarn's Reign. But worse than that, they seem to have bonded together and focused on the Civilized races as their favorite prey.
TEXT.German: The animals of Erebus have become far more hostile in the abnormal, lengthy Winter brought on by Mulcarn's Reign. But worse than that, they seem to have bonded together and focused on the Civilized races as their favorite prey.
TEXT.Italian: The animals of Erebus have become far more hostile in the abnormal, lengthy Winter brought on by Mulcarn's Reign. But worse than that, they seem to have bonded together and focused on the Civilized races as their favorite prey.
TEXT.Spanish: The animals of Erebus have become far more hostile in the abnormal, lengthy Winter brought on by Mulcarn's Reign. But worse than that, they seem to have bonded together and focused on the Civilized races as their favorite prey.

TEXT.English: Agares's Minions have begun to make their way into the realms of Man. Though initially only the weakest of the fould lot can break through, in time creatures that can rend the world shall be capable of breezing through the rift between worlds without a moments hesitation.
TEXT.French: Agares's Minions have begun to make their way into the realms of Man. Though initially only the weakest of the fould lot can break through, in time creatures that can rend the world shall be capable of breezing through the rift between worlds without a moments hesitation.
